pkmkdoc.description: The Neurospaces developer package contains essential tools for Neurospaces development. The Neurospaces project develops software components of neuronal simulator that integrate in a just-in-time manner for the exploration, simulation and validation of accurate neuronal models. Neurospaces spans the range from single molecules to subcellular networks, over single cells to neuronal networks. Neurospaces is backwards-compatible with the GENESIS simulator, integrates with Python and Perl, separates models from experimental protocols, and reads model definitions from declarative specifications in a variety of formats. This package contains utilities requires for Neurospaces development.

requirement.message: Standard Perl for Mac OSX is not installed. Installed this from your Mac OSX installation disks since non-standard perl may cause errors.
